com.samsung.android.sdk.motion

Class SmotionActivity.Info

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.motion.SmotionActivity.Info
  • Enclosing class:
    SmotionActivity

    public static class SmotionActivity.Info
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the activity event information and provides methods to access it.
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ACCURACY_HIGH
      High accuracy of the activity event.
      static int ACCURACY_LOW
      Low accuracy of the activity event.
      static int ACCURACY_MID
      Medium accuracy of the activity event.
      static int MODE_ALL
      Both batch and real time activity mode.
      static int MODE_BATCH
      Batch activity mode.
      static int MODE_REALTIME
      Real time activity mode.
      static int STATUS_RUN
      User is running.
      static int STATUS_STATIONARY
      User is not moving.
      static int STATUS_UNKNOWN
      Current activity cannot be detected.
      static int STATUS_VEHICLE
      User is in a vehicle, such as a car.
      static int STATUS_WALK
      User is walking.

        Constant Field Values

      • MODE_REALTIME

        public static final int MODE_REALTIME
        Real time activity mode.

        In this mode, all activity events are reported as soon as they are detected. This mode is only operational when the device is in the wake-up status.
        Since:
        2.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MODE_BATCH

        public static final int MODE_BATCH
        Batch activity mode. In this mode, all activity events are stored in a batch buffer. When the batch buffer is full, the stored events are reported.
        Since:
        2.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmotionActivity.Info

        public SmotionActivity.Info()
        Creates a SmotionActivity.Info instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the device does not support SmotionActivity or the SmotionActivity instance is not created.
        Since:
        2.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
        Get the activity status.
        Returns:
        The activity status.

        The valid values are:

        STATUS_RUN

        STATUS_STATIONARY

        STATUS_UNKNOWN

        STATUS_VEHICLE

        STATUS_WALK

        Since:
        2.0.0

      • getAccuracy

        public int getAccuracy()
        Get the accuracy of the detected activity.
        Returns:
        The accuracy of the detected activity.

        The valid values are:

        ACCURACY_HIGH

        ACCURACY_LOW

        ACCURACY_MID

        Since:
        2.0.0

      • getTimeStamp

        public long getTimeStamp()
        Get the timestamp in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The time in milliseconds when the activity event occurred,

        The time is measured in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00.0 UTC.
        Since:
        2.0.0
